    Your Journey with Jennie

    About Jennie Wolek


    Jennie Wolek and her team, The Wolek Group, help over 100 families a year buy and sell real estate in Tulsa, OK. Most of their business comes from their database or a personal referral. Jennie shares the systems and tools used by The Wolek Group and also interviews top agents who give insight to their success secrets as well.

    Jennie Wolek
    The Wolek Group
